TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/Window/HelpButton extends System.Object
public: ref class VisualStyleElement::Window::HelpButton abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Provides objects for each state of the **Help** button of a window or dialog box. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 每个属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.HelpButton>类返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>不同状态的**帮助**的窗口或对话框中的按钮。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.HelpButton.Normal%2A>属性。 若要运行此示例，请将其粘贴到 Windows 窗体中。 处理窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件并调用`DrawVisualStyleElementWindowHelpButton1`方法从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理方法，并传递`e`作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#403](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/CS/Form1.cs#403)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#403](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/VB/Form1.vb#403)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Disabled As VisualStyleElement

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents a **Help** button in the disabled state.
Docs.value: A表示 * * 帮助 * * 按钮处于禁用状态。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.HelpButton.Disabled%2A>属性创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>。
